description: The exact meaning of Soft Skills can arguably be a challenge to explain. It can be used to refer to people skills, interpersonal skills, emotional intelligence, communication, problem solving or self confidence, to mention but a few. This course will try to discuss 10 of such skills. With our 10 Soft Skills You Need Udemy course you will better understand the importance of developing a set of soft skills. Research has shown that 85% of an individual's success can be attributed to a well developed set of soft skills, while technical skills only account for the remaining 15%
title: 10 Soft Skills You Need To Be Successful
